text:
Civis Analytics | DevOps Engineer |Chicago, IL| ONSITE, FULL-TIME |https://www.civisanalytics.com/careers/

The DevOps team delivers, maintains, and evolves the infrastructure that makes all of this possible. We are looking for individuals from a wide range of backgrounds with demonstrated quantitative and problem-solving skills. We value creativity, hard work, and on-the-job-excellence.

Interested? Apply online or email me (main recruiter) directly at nbrown@civisanalytics.com
